TopicTitle: Different aero CoL in VAB vs SPH

Articles.Content: When I open a craft in the VAB I get a different CoL then when I open in the SPH. This images show the exact same craft in both.
This is normal, no need to panic.
But how do I know which one is right? Or do I have to design planes in the SPH and import them into the VAB to design them properly?

The SPH assumes a about 5 degree angle of attack, whereas the VAB assumes 0 degrees. They are both correct. You can rotate the plane about 5 degrees nose down in the SPH, and you should see the CoL match the VAB (or vice versa).
